text:
Sources say Khloé Kardashian desperately wants to return to LA to be with her family, but right now she's trying to do what's best for True, which means staying put in Cleveland.

“Yes, she would like to be back home in LA, but she’s also doing what’s best for her child,” the source told People. “She wanted to give the baby time to adjust and to literally stay alive, so she’s of course following doctor’s orders.” The source said the plan is for the new mom and her baby to head back home as soon as they can.



But other sources are reporting that Khloé may or may not have snuck out of Cleveland already. According to E! News, Kim Kardashian, Kourtney Kardashian and Kendall Jenner all flew into Cleveland on Tuesday to be with Khloé (her mom Kris Jenner was already there). Yesterday, all of them flew back to LA together, and when they left for the airport, they had an extra person with them that E! called a "mystery person" that was "all covered up." Seriously, this is not a joke. Please take a second to picture Kris literally smuggling Khloé out of Ohio. The story is unconfirmed, but an amazing mental image nonetheless. Okay, moving on.



This content is imported from Instagram. You may be able to find the same content in another format, or you may be able to find more information, at their web site.

Khloé is reportedly loving being a new mom, despite all the cheating allegations that surfaced against her baby's father Tristan Thompson last week, two days before she gave birth. “Khloé’s in heaven right now as a new mom,” the insider told People. “Drama with Tristan aside, she’s super happy and really trying to enjoy every moment with her baby."

Follow Emma on Instagram.
authors: Emma Baty Is The Entertainment Editor At Cosmopolitan
Generally Obsesses Over All Things Pop Culture.
title: This Is the One Thing Keeping Khloé ​​Kardashian From Going to LA
